tracks.name: CeNDR variation
tracks.description: Strain variant data from https://www.elegansvariation.org/.  For more information see Cook DE, Zdraljevic S, Roberts JP, Andersen EC. CeNDR, the Caenorhabditis elegans natural diversity resource. Nucleic Acids Res. 2017 Jan 4;45(D1):D650-D657. doi: 10.1093/nar/gkw893. Epub 2016 Oct 3. PubMed PMID: 27701074; PubMed Central PMCID: PMC5210618. Colors follow the same scheme as ENSEMBL for predicted variants (https://uswest.ensembl.org/info/genome/variation/prediction/predicted_data.html), and variants with no predicted impact are black and variants that don't have recognized predicted consequence are peachpuff (a pale pink-orange). Variants with more than one predicted consequences are colored by the first annotation.
